message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. I can come down a bit to $11,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I really appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still hoping to get closer to my target of $10,500.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
